Package com.mazeco.utilities

Class MazeProblem

java.lang.Object
com.mazeco.utilities.MazeProblem
public final class MazeProblem extends Object
Represents an instance of a maze solving problem and defines the operation logic for MazeSolver.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • MazeProblem

      public MazeProblem(MazeModel mazeModel)

  • Method Details

    • actions

      public ArrayList<String> actions(Point state)
      Gets a list of legal actions from the current state.
      Parameters:
      state - Point Object representing the (x,y) coordinates of the currently visiting block.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Strings representing the legal actions from the current state. i.e. 'Up', 'Down', 'Left', 'Right'

    • result

      public Point result(Point state, String action)
      Gets the resulting Point Object after an action has been applied to a problem state.
      Parameters:
      state - Point Object representing the (x,y) coordinates of the currently visiting block.
      action - String representing the action to apply to the current state. i.e. 'Up', 'Down', 'Left', 'Right'
      Returns:
      the resulting Point Object after an action has been applied if the move was successful. Else throws IllegalArgumentException.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the action cannot be applied to the current state.

    • goalTest

      public boolean goalTest(Point state)
      Tests if a given problem state is the desired goal state. i.e. find the maze exit.
      Parameters:
      state - Point Object representing the (x,y) coordinates of the currently visiting block to test.
      Returns:
      true if the given state is the goal state, false otherwise.

    • pathCost

      public int pathCost(int cost)
      Deternines the path cost of the problem. Each move for the maze solving problem costs 1 unit.
      Parameters:
      cost - the current cost to reach the problem state.
      Returns:
      the current cost plus 1 unit. i.e. all moves cost equally as 1 unit.
